craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +10 additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4).

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 10% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1650 maximum Health, the bonus increases to 75%.

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to 300 damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: The wearer's Basic Attacks restore 8 additional Mana.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 400 Health and shed all negative effects.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Basic attacks heal the wearer for 33% of the damage dealt.

Upon falling below 40% Health, the wearer gain a 30% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

craf.name: ZekesHerald
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +25% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Grants 75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: RapidFirecannon
craf.add_attrs:
Increases the wearer's Attack Range by 1 hex and grants 20% bonus Attack Speed.

The wearer's Basic Attacks can no longer miss.

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks grant +6% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain 3 Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critical strike.

craf.name: ZzRotPortal
craf.add_attrs:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power (including components).

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain Ability Power equal to 45% of their maximum Mana (this bonus applies to that Ability cast).

craf.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 
300/350/400 ★ damage for 8 seconds.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
When the holder deals magic damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains +40% bonus critical strike damage.

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 20 mana.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: FrozenHeart
craf.add_attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of enemies within 2 hexes by 25%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Chalice
craf.add_attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 25 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, the holder radiates an aura to allies within 1 Hex, healing them for 20% of their missing Health.

Affected allies take 25% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks for 5 seconds

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
At the begining of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
- +45 Attack Damage and +45 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 80/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: The holder gains 18 Armor and 18 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2.5 seconds, a random enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum health over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Shroud
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 35% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs: Grants 250 bonus Magic Resist (including components).

craf.name: Zephyr
craf.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: WarmogsArmor
craf.add_attrs: Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

craf.name: Backhand
craf.add_attrs:
Blocks the first enemy Ability that hits the holder, and stuns the Ability's caster for 4 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equip 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three item Slots. Cannot Grant Shadow Items]

embl.name: SwordoftheDivine
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Skirmisher trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: DuelistsZeal
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Legionnaire trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: MantleofDusk
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: MagesCap
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Renewer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: VanguardsCuirass
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Ironclad trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ElderwoodHeirloom
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Redeemed trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: WarlordsBanner
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Dawnbringer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: YoumuusGhostblade
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Assassin trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowSwordoftheDivine
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Forgotten trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowDuelistsZeal
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Hellion trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowMantleofDusk
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Dragonslayer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowMagesCap
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Coven trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowVanguardsCuirass
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowElderwoodHeirloom
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Revenant trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowWarlordsBanner
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Nightbringer trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

embl.name: ShadowYoumuusGhostblade
embl.add_attrs:
The holder gains the Abomination trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: ForceofNature
spec.attrs: Wearer's team gains +1 maximum team size.

spec.name: CursedDeathblade
spec.attrs: Contributing to a kill grants the holder +15 Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times (starting at 4). The holder receives -20% maximum Health.

spec.name: EvilGiantSlayer
spec.attrs: The holder's Abilities and attacks do 50% bonus damage. If the target has more than 1100 maximum Health.

spec.name: CursedHextechGunblade
spec.attrs: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heals the ally with lowest percent Health for 60% of the damage dealt. This heal cannot affect the holder.

spec.name: CursedSpearofShojin
spec.attrs: The wearer's attacks restore 14 additional Mana. The wearer deals 15% less damage.

spec.name: GuardianFallenAngel
spec.attrs:
Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After 2 seconds, they return with 70% Health and shed all negative effects. After this effect triggers, the holder's Attack Speed is reduced by 50% for the rest of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: Riskthirster
spec.attrs: Physical damage heals the holder for 40% of the damage dealt. Each time the holder heals to 90% Health, they gain 30% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. The holder takes 25% of their maximum Health in true damage at the beginning of combat.

spec.name: ZekesEvilHerald
spec.attrs: When combat begins, the holder reduces the Attack Speed of all allies within 1 hexes in the same row by -20%. The holder then gains +40% Attack Speed for each affected ally.

spec.name: CursedInfinityEdge
spec.attrs:
Grants +75% Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes +1% Critical Strike Damage. The holder also gains 30% Critical Strike Damage. Each time the holder attacks or cast their Ability, they take true damage equal to 3% of their maximum Health.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: RapidDeathcannon
spec.attrs:
Increases the holder's Attack Range by 1 hex. Additionally, the holder gains +40% bonus Attack Speed when there are no enemies within 2 hex.

The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

spec.name: GuinsoosEvilRageblade
spec.attrs: Attacks grant +9% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. The bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times. The holder is dealt 2.5% of their maximum Health as true damage each attack.

spec.name: EvilStatikkShiv
spec.attrs:
Every other attack from the holder unleashes chain lightning that strikes 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

The holder receives -33% Attack Damage.

spec.name: TitansExplosiveResolve
spec.attrs: Every 3 seconds, the holder's next attack deals 20% of the total damage they have taken since the last empowered attack as true damage.

spec.name: RunaansEvilHurricane
spec.attrs: The holder's attacks fire bolts at 2 nearby enemies, dealing 50% of the holder's Attack Damage. These bolts can critically strike but do not apply on-hit effects.

spec.name: ZzRotDarkPortal
spec.attrs:
At the start of combat, the holder taunts enemies within 2 hexes.

When the holder dies, an Unstable Voidspawn with 500 Health arises and taunts enemies again. When it dies it deals 500 true damage to enemies within 1 hex(es).

Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 50% effective.

spec.name: FinalWhisper
spec.attrs: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor and Magic Resist are reduced by 70% for 5 seconds. The holder's Armor and Magic Resist are also permanently reduced by 25%.

spec.name: RabadonsCursedDeathcap
spec.attrs: Grants 100 bonus Ability Power (including components) and -20% maximum Health.

spec.name: ArchdemonsStaff
spec.attrs: Each time the holder casts their Ability, they gain empty maximum Health equal to 350% of their maximum Mana. The holder then heals for that amount.

spec.name: LocketoftheDarkSolari
spec.attrs: When combat begins, the holder and all allies with 2 hexes in the same row gain 60 bonus Armor and Magic Resist, but gain 5 less Mana per attack.

spec.name: IonicDarkSpark
spec.attrs: Enemies and allies (except the holder) within 2 hexes are zapped when they cast an ability, taking magic damage scaling with their maximum Mana. Enemies take 200% of their maximum Mana, and allies take 50% of their maximum Mana. Whenever an ally or enemy is zapped, the holder gains 10 Ability Power for the rest of combat.

spec.name: Morevillonomicon
spec.attrs:
When the holder deals magic damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing 100% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 25 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.
The holder's Ability deals 50% less damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: PoisonedGauntlet
spec.attrs: The holder gains 40% Critical Strike Damage and magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The first time the holder casts their Ability each combat, they gain an additional 20% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat (this bonus applies to that Ability cast). Each time the holder casts their Ability, they deal 100% of their maximum Mana to themselves as true damage.

spec.name: VeryDarkBlueBuff
spec.attrs:
After casting their Ability, the holder gains 15 Mana. If the holder has less than 60% Health, this is increased to 50.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: FrozenDarkHeart
spec.attrs:
Reduces the Attack Speed of all enemies within 2 hexes by 35%.

The Attack Speed of allies (except the wearer) within 1 hex is reduced by 35%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: ChaliceofMalice
spec.attrs: When combat begins, all of the holder's allies within 1 hex in the same row gain 40 Ability Power for the rest of combat. The holder loses 20 Ability Power instead of gaining any.

spec.name: LackofRedemption
spec.attrs: The holder radiates an aura to all allies on the board except themself, and heals them for 25% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Each time this happens, the holder damages themselves for 5% of their current Health as true damage.

spec.name: HandofVengence
spec.attrs:
At the beginning of combat, the holder gains both of the following:
- +40 Attack Damage and +40 Ability Power.
- Attacks and Abilities heal for 40% of damage dealt.
These bonuses expire after each takedown, and renew on the next.

spec.name: VillainsBrambleVest
spec.attrs: Grants 200 bonus Armor (including components).

spec.name: EvilGargoyleStoneplate
spec.attrs: The holder heals themself for 45 health every 2 seconds for each unit targeting them.

spec.name: EclipseCape
spec.attrs:
Every 1.5 second(s), a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 50%. The holder is also burned for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 8 seconds, and any healing they received is reduced by 50%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: DarkShroudofStillness
spec.attrs:
When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead and behind that delays affected enemies' and other allies' first ability cast, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: DarkDragonsClaw
spec.attrs: Reduces incoming magic damage by 15%. Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits.

spec.name: ExplosiveZephyr
spec.attrs:
When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds. Once the enemy returns to combat, they gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power for the rest of combat. Ignores CC immunity.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: EvilQuicksilver
spec.attrs:
The wearer is immune to crowd control for the entirety of combat and receives -20% maximum Health.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: WarmogsPoisonArmor
spec.attrs: Grants 1800 bonus Health (including components). The holder takes 60 true damage each second.

spec.name: ExplosiveTrapClaw
spec.attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex(es) in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

spec.name: ForceofDarkness
spec.attrs: The holder's team gains +2 maximum team size, but the player's Little Legend takes +100% damage after losing a battle.

spec.name: CursedThiefsGlove
spec.attrs:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. These Items are always full shadow items.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]
